name: Welcome to the VOID (Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych)
name_original: Welcome to the VOID (Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych)
description:
You were awakened by your Anabot, the anabiosis chamber manager. The universe is dead — all stars are long burned out, and space is covered in darkness. Explore the universe, feel the cosmic gloom, upgrade the ship, raid ancient mining facilities, and find your way out of the V O I D.

This is a rather long story for a jam game, but the game saves your progress.

I don't know why some people experience dril-like shaking of the ship. Everything works smoothly on my PC. I also won't have time to resolve this issue as I'll fly in space tomorrow :c

Meta

Made for the Mini Jam 24: Space

Created by Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych with ct.js game editor.

Images by Freepik.

Music by DOS-88.
